about.tagline: Your Premier Destination for Adult-Themed Connections
about.intro: At Voksenannoncer, we provide a safe and welcoming platform for adults to create ads and connect with like-minded individuals. Whether you’re looking to meet new people, find a special connection, or explore your desires, Voksenannoncer is here to help.
about.safeAndSecureDesc: Your privacy and safety are our top priorities. We employ advanced security measures to ensure your personal information is protected.
about.connectWithDesc: Our community is filled with people who share your interests and desires. Connect, chat, and meet in a space that understands and respects your needs.
about.easyToUseDesc: Creating ads and connecting with others is simple and intuitive. Our user-friendly interface makes it easy to navigate and find what you’re looking for.
about.discreetConfidentialDesc: We understand the importance of discretion. Your activities on Voksenannoncer are confidential, giving you peace of mind while you explore.
about.createAdDesc: Share what you;re looking for and attract like-minded individuals.
about.browseConnectDesc: Explore ads from others and reach out to those who catch your interest.
about.enjoyExperienceDesc: Build connections, explore your desires, and enjoy the Voksenannoncer community.
about.joinToday: Join Voksenannoncer today and start connecting with people who share your passions and interests.

cookiePolicy.introduction: Welcome to Voksenannoncer. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them on our website, and your choices regarding cookies.
cookiePolicy.whatAreCookiesDesc: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device by websites that you visit. They are widely used to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the site owners.
cookiePolicy.howWeUseCookiesDesc: Voksenannoncer uses cookies for a variety of reasons, including:
cookiePolicy.essentialCookiesDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable you to navigate our site and use its features.
cookiePolicy.performanceCookiesDesc: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. They allow us to improve the functionality and user experience of our site.
cookiePolicy.functionalityCookiesDesc: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, more personal features.
cookiePolicy.advertisingCookiesDesc: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements more relevant to you and your interests. They also help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
cookiePolicy.cookiesWeUseDesc: Here is a list of the types of cookies we use on Voksenannoncer:
cookiePolicy.sessionCookiesDesc: Temporary cookies that remain in your browser's cookie file until you leave the site.
cookiePolicy.persistentCookiesDesc: These cookies remain in your browser's cookie file for much longer, depending on the duration of each specific cookie.
cookiePolicy.yourChoicesDesc: You have the right to choose whether or not to accept cookies. However, please note that if you choose to refuse cookies, you may not be able to use the full functionality of our website. Here are a few ways you can manage your cookie preferences:
cookiePolicy.browserSettingsDesc: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or delete certain cookies.
cookiePolicy.optOutLinksDesc: Some third-party advertisers provide a mechanism to opt-out of their cookies. For more information about third-party cookies and your choices regarding them, visit https://www.youronlinechoices.com.
cookiePolicy.changesPolicyDesc: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. When we make changes to this policy, we will update the 'Effective Date' at the top of this page.
cookiePolicy.contactUsDesc: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us at:

support.title: Support
support.contactEmail: For any questions or issues please contact

cookiePolicy.description: Voksenannoncer uses cookies to remember your settings and statistics. This information is shared with third parties. Read our full cookie and privacy policy here.

intro-banner.headline: Welcome! We're Excited to Have You Here.
intro-banner.body: Our site is new, so content is still growing. Whether you're offering tantric massages, escorting services, adult-themed courses, or looking for participants for your next swinger party, you can promote your services here. It's easy and completely free. Rest assured, we review all ads to ensure compliance and to keep out any illegal content.

seo-descriptor.p1: Welcome to Voksenannoncer, Denmark's premier independent advertisement site for <searchLink>escort</searchLink> services, <searchLink>massage</searchLink>, and erotic material sales. Posting ads on Voksenannoncer is completely free, and everyone can advertise services related to <searchLink>escort</searchLink>, <searchLink>massage</searchLink>, <searchLink>sex</searchLink>, or <searchLink>erotic</searchLink> content. Whether you have ads about <searchLink>gangbangs</searchLink>, <searchLink>swinger</searchLink> clubs, sex novels, <searchLink>sex</searchLink> <searchLink>dating</searchLink> sites, or other erotic content, you are welcome here. Our primary niche includes amateur advertisers, both girls and boys, but we also cater to massage clinics and agencies. If you have specific requirements for escort girls or men, you can browse through search ads tailored to your needs. At Voksenannoncer, we do not judge but provide a platform for everyone to share their services.
seo-descriptor.p2: We aim to offer an easy and quick overview of <searchLink>sex</searchLink>, <searchLink>escort</searchLink>, and <searchLink>massage</searchLink> options in your local area. Whether you're from <searchLink>Copenhagen</searchLink>, <searchLink>Odense</searchLink>, <searchLink>Aalborg</searchLink>, <searchLink>Esbjerg</searchLink>, <searchLink>Horsens</searchLink>, <searchLink>Randers</searchLink>, <searchLink>Herning</searchLink>, or <searchLink>Vejle</searchLink>, you can find local escort girls and massage clinics on Voksenannoncer. You'll also find plenty of inspiration for your sex life here.
seo-descriptor.p3: Voksenannoncer is the go-to advertising platform for a vast majority of independent escort girls and men, as well as for escort services and massage clinics. We also feature ads from erotic concept creators and dating sites, along with sellers of sex toys. Advertising on our platform is free—just create an account, wait for approval, and you're ready to go.
seo-descriptor.p4: If you're interested in buying banner space on our site, we offer various options. Contact us at <emailLink>support@voksen-annoncer.com</emailLink> for detailed information on prices and available options.
seo-descriptor.p5: Voksenannoncer reserves the right to delete any advertisements that promote illegal activities or contain defamatory content. We work closely with the police on any cases involving illegal activities such as the sale of medicine or offensive content towards individuals.
seo-descriptor.p6: If you have suggestions to improve our site, feel free to write to our support team. We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours on weekdays. Please note that our support staff is not available on weekends, so your patience is appreciated during that time.
seo-descriptor.p7: We hope you have a great experience with Voksenannoncer, a site for sex ads, escort services, massage, and erotic content.
